      • FtpSession

        public FtpSession(java.lang.String url)
           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Creates a new FTP-session for the given URL notation.
        Parameters:
        url - String url to host
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if host name is malformed
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if host name is empty
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • FtpSession

        public FtpSession(java.net.URL url)
        Creates a new FTP-session from the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - URL - url with FTP, FTPS, FTPES protocol
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if wrong protocol or no domain supplied
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • fileList

        public java.lang.String[] fileList(java.lang.String path,
                                   boolean recurse)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the list of all full domain paths of files which start with the given text. This does not include directories!
        Parameters:
        path - String starting value of file list (may be a directory name or a trunk of a file name).
        recurse - boolean whether results should include sub-directories
        Returns:
        array of String, each giving a full file path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
